title: Public transport for the A League Round 12 – Melbourne Victory v Western Utd: Tuesday 20 February 2024
articleContent:
Public transport for the A League Round 12 – Melbourne Victory v Western Utd: Tuesday 20 February 2024

Events > Sport

Isuzu UTE A League Men’s is back at AAMI Park. Public transport is your best way to enjoy it, as the Melbourne Victory taking on Western Utd. Extra services will help you get to and from the AAMI Park on Tuesday 20 February 2024.

The event will begin at 7.

Before you travel

Plan your journey using Journey planner and check Disruptions for service changes that may affect your journey.

 Metropolitan train

Return service from Richmond Station:

  • Lilydale – leaving at 9:08pm from Platform 9
  • Glen Waverley – leaving at 9:19pm from Platform 10
  • Pakenham – leaving at 9:16pm from Platform 6
  • Frankston – leaving at 9:13pm from Platform 4
  • Sandringham – leaving at 9:14pm from Platform 2

 Metropolitan tram

Getting to and from AAMI Park

Route 70

  • Trams will operate from Flinders Street/Elizabeth Street (Stop 4) and Stop 7C MCG/John Cain Arena.

Plan your journey using Journey planner.

 Metropolitan bus

Passengers can catch the following buses close to AAMI Park:

  • Route 246

Please note, services may terminate prior to the end of the match.

Plan your journey using Journey planner.

 Regional train

Normal services depart from Southern Cross Station.

Plan your journey using Journey planner.
articleDescription: Isuzu UTE A League Men’s is back at AAMI Park. Public transport is your best way to enjoy it, as the Melbourne Victory taking on Western Utd. Extra services will help you get to and from the AAMI Park on Tuesday 20 February 2024.
